title: IVY Classic 44780 SDS-Plus to 3/8" Square Socket Adaptor, 3" Length, Impact Plus, 1/Card
features: Allows SDS Plus Style drills to fit standard sockets to drive hex-head screws, bolts and nuts. Do not use for hammer drilling.
Chrome Vanadium Steel for extra strength and durability
Built to withstand the high torque (rotational force) of impact drivers, Impact Plus (Registered Trademark)
Ball and spring retention for quick-change applications
Size: SDS Plus - 3/8" Square, Length: 3", Shank: SDS Plus
description: IVY Classic Hex to Square Socket Adapters allow drills and impact drivers to fit standard sockets to drive hex-head screws, bolts and nuts. These socket adapters are designed to withstand the high torque (rotational force) of impact drivers, Impact Plus (Registered Trademark). Made from high-quality Chrome Vanadium Steel for extra strength and durability. The ball and spring retention system allows for quick-change applications. IVY Classic Industries manufactures an extensive line of hex to square socket adapters in a variety of sizes and lengths. IVY Classic Industries is dedicated to producing a comprehensive, quality line of power tool accessories and hand tools.
